AxleFlowValue.title: AxleFlowValue
AxleFlowValue.description: A measured or calculated value of the flow rate of vehicle axles.

axleFlowRate.title: axleFlowRate
axleFlowRate.description: A value of the flow rate of vehicle axles expressed in axles per hour.

BasicData.title: BasicData
BasicData.description: Data that are either measured or calculated at the same time or over the same time period.

measurementOrCalculationTime.title: measurementOrCalculationTime
measurementOrCalculationTime.description: Characteristics of the measurement or calculation time which should be considered to override any specified defaults

DailyTrafficFlowValue.title: DailyTrafficFlowValue
DailyTrafficFlowValue.description: A measured or calculated value of daily traffic flow

vehicleFlowRate.title: vehicleFlowRate
vehicleFlowRate.description: Value of daily vehicle flow in units of vehicles per day

DateTimeValue.title: DateTimeValue
DateTimeValue.description: A measured or calculated value of an instant in time.

dateTime.title: dateTime
dateTime.description: A time stamp defining an instant in time.

DensityVehiclesPerKilometre.title: DensityVehiclesPerKilometre
DensityVehiclesPerKilometre.description: A measure of traffic density defined in number of vehicles per kilometre of road.

DurationValue.title: DurationValue
DurationValue.description: A measured or calculated value of a period of time.

duration.title: duration
duration.description: A period of time expressed in seconds.

ElaboratedDataPublication.title: ElaboratedDataPublication
ElaboratedDataPublication.description: A publication containing one or more elaborated data sets.

forecastDefault.title: forecastDefault
forecastDefault.description: The default value for the publication of whether the elaborated data is a forecast (true = forecast).

periodDefault.title: periodDefault
periodDefault.description: The default value for the publication of the time elapsed between the beginning and the end of the sampling or measurement period. This item may differ from the unit attribute; e.g. an hourly flow can be estimated from a 5-minute measurement period.

timeDefault.title: timeDefault
timeDefault.description: The default for the publication of the time at which the values have been computed/derived.

informationManager.title: informationManager
informationManager.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content.

IndividualVehicleDataValues.title: IndividualVehicleDataValues
IndividualVehicleDataValues.description: Measured or calculated data values relating to individual vehicles derived from detectors at the specified measurement site.

arrivalTime.title: arrivalTime
arrivalTime.description: The time of the arrival of an individual vehicle in a detection zone.

distanceGap.title: distanceGap
distanceGap.description: The measured distance between the front of this vehicle and the rear of the preceding one, in metres at the specified measurement site.

distanceHeadway.title: distanceHeadway
distanceHeadway.description: The measured distance between one end (normally the front) of this vehicle and the same end of the preceding vehicle at the specified measurement site.

exitTime.title: exitTime
exitTime.description: The time when an individual vehicle leaves a detection zone.

passageDuration.title: passageDuration
passageDuration.description: The time elapsed between an individual vehicle entering a detection zone and exiting the same detection zone as detected by entry and exit sensors.

presenceDuration.title: presenceDuration
presenceDuration.description: The period of time during which a vehicle activates a presence sensor.

speed.title: speed
speed.description: The measured speed of the individual vehicle at the specified measurement site.

timeGap.title: timeGap
timeGap.description: The time interval between the arrival of this vehicle's front at a point on the roadway, and that of the departure of the rear of the preceding one.

timeHeadway.title: timeHeadway
timeHeadway.description: The measured time interval between this vehicle's arrival at (or departure from) a point on the roadway, and the equivalent event for the preceding vehicle.

individualVehicle.title: individualVehicle
individualVehicle.description: Properties of the individual vehicle to which the measurement values relate

MeasuredDataPublication.title: MeasuredDataPublication
MeasuredDataPublication.description: A publication containing one or more measurement data sets, each set being measured at a single measurement site.

measurementSiteTableReference.title: measurementSiteTableReference
measurementSiteTableReference.description: A reference to a versioned Measurement Site table.

MeasuredOrDerivedDataTypeEnum.title: MeasuredOrDerivedDataTypeEnum
MeasuredOrDerivedDataTypeEnum.description: Types of measured or derived data.

MeasurementOrCalculationTime.title: MeasurementOrCalculationTime
MeasurementOrCalculationTime.description: Describes the time at which a measured or calculated value or set of values was measured or calculated. It may be a future time at which a data value is predicted to apply.

timePrecision.title: timePrecision
timePrecision.description: The precision to which the time of measurement or calculation is given.

timeValue.title: timeValue
timeValue.description: Point in time at which this specific value or set of values has been measured or calculated. It may also be a future time at which a data value is predicted.  It may be the time of the beginning, the end or the middle of a measurement period.

MeasurementSite.title: MeasurementSite
MeasurementSite.description: An identifiable single measurement site entry/record in the measurement site table.

measurementSiteRecordVersionTime.title: measurementSiteRecordVersionTime
measurementSiteRecordVersionTime.description: The date/time that this version of the measurement site record was defined. The identity and version of the measurement site record are defined by the class stereotype implementation.

measurementEquipmentReference.title: measurementEquipmentReference
measurementEquipmentReference.description: The reference given to the measurement equipment at the site.

measurementEquipmentTypeUsed.title: measurementEquipmentTypeUsed
measurementEquipmentTypeUsed.description: The type of equipment used to gather the raw information from which the data values are determined, e.g. 'loop', 'ANPR' (automatic number plate recognition) or 'urban traffic management system' (such as SCOOT).

measurementSiteNumberOfLanes.title: measurementSiteNumberOfLanes
measurementSiteNumberOfLanes.description: The number of lanes over which the measured value is determined.

measurementSiteIdentification.title: measurementSiteIdentification
measurementSiteIdentification.description: Identification of a measurement site used by the supplier or consumer systems.

measurementSpecificCharacteristics.title: measurementSpecificCharacteristics
measurementSpecificCharacteristics.description: Indexed measurement-specific characteristics associated with the measurement site. The index uniquely associates the measurement characteristics with the corresponding indexed measurement values for the measurement site.

informationManagerOverride.title: informationManagerOverride
informationManagerOverride.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content. This value overrides any value specified at a more general level.

MeasurementSiteTable.title: MeasurementSiteTable
MeasurementSiteTable.description: A Measurement Site Table comprising a number of sets of data, each describing the location from where a stream of measured data may be derived.  Each location is known as a "measurement site" which can be a point, a linear road section or an area.

measurementSiteTableIdentification.title: measurementSiteTableIdentification
measurementSiteTableIdentification.description: An alphanumeric identification for the measurement site table, possibly human readable.

informationManager.title: informationManager
informationManager.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content.

MeasurementSiteTablePublication.title: MeasurementSiteTablePublication
MeasurementSiteTablePublication.description: A publication containing one or more Measurement Site Tables.

MeasurementSpecificCharacteristics.title: MeasurementSpecificCharacteristics
MeasurementSpecificCharacteristics.description: Characteristics which are specific to an individual measurement type (specified in a known order) at the given measurement site.

accuracy.title: accuracy
accuracy.description: The extent to which the value is expected to be free from error, measured as a percentage of the data value. 100% means fully accurate.

computationMethod.title: computationMethod
computationMethod.description: Method of computation which is used to compute the measured value at the measurement site.

defaultMeasurementHeight.title: defaultMeasurementHeight
defaultMeasurementHeight.description: Default height, above (positive value) or below (negative value) ground level, at which measurements are made. For example in wind measurement this could be the height of an anemometer.

measurementSide.title: measurementSide
measurementSide.description: Side of the road on which measurements are acquired, corresponding to the direction of the road.

period.title: period
period.description: The time elapsed between the beginning and the end of the sampling or measurement period. This item may differ from the unit attribute; e.g. an hourly flow can be estimated from a 5-minute measurement period.

smoothingFactor.title: smoothingFactor
smoothingFactor.description: Coefficient required when a moving average is computed to give specific weights to the former average and the new data. A typical formula is, F being the smoothing factor: New average = (old average) F + (new data) (1 - F).

specificMeasurementValueType.title: specificMeasurementValueType
specificMeasurementValueType.description: The type of this specific measurement at the measurement site.

specificLane.title: specificLane
specificLane.description: The lane(s) to which the specific measurement at the measurement site relate(s). This overrides any lane specified for the measurement site as a whole.

axleCharacteristics.title: axleCharacteristics
axleCharacteristics.description: Axle characteristics for which the measurement applies

PcuFlowValue.title: PcuFlowValue
PcuFlowValue.description: A measured or calculated value of the flow rate of passenger car units.

pcuFlowRate.title: pcuFlowRate
pcuFlowRate.description: A value of passenger car unit flow rate expressed in passenger car units per hour.

PhysicalQuantity.title: PhysicalQuantity
PhysicalQuantity.description: A measured or calculated physical quantity, with related properties explaining its context, meaning or status

forecast.title: forecast
forecast.description: Indication of whether this quantity data is a forecast (true = forecast).

measurementEquipmentTypeUsed.title: measurementEquipmentTypeUsed
measurementEquipmentTypeUsed.description: The type of equipment used to gather the raw information from which the data values are determined, e.g. 'loop', 'ANPR' (automatic number plate recognition) or 'urban traffic management system' (such as SCOOT).

pertinentLocation.title: pertinentLocation
pertinentLocation.description: The location (e.g. the stretch of road or area) to which the data value(s) is or are pertinent/relevant. This may be different from the location of the measurement equipment (i.e. the measurement site location).

informationManagerOverride.title: informationManagerOverride
informationManagerOverride.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content. This value overrides any value specified at a more general level.

PhysicalQuantityFault.title: PhysicalQuantityFault
PhysicalQuantityFault.description: Details of a fault related to the derivation of a quantity

physicalQuantityFaultType.title: physicalQuantityFaultType
physicalQuantityFaultType.description: The type of fault related to the measurement or calculation of the physical quantity

PhysicalQuantityFaultEnum.title: PhysicalQuantityFaultEnum
PhysicalQuantityFaultEnum.description: Types of faults that may affect the measurement or calculation of physical quantities

noPrecipitation.title: noPrecipitation
noPrecipitation.description: Indication of whether precipitation is present or not. True indicates that there is no precipitation.

ReferenceSettings.title: ReferenceSettings
ReferenceSettings.description: Specification of default values for locations on the road network. Where a default status value is supplied, it shall apply for all specified locations, unless the publication includes an additional status value for a specified location.

predefinedLocationGroupReference.title: predefinedLocationGroupReference
predefinedLocationGroupReference.description: A reference to a versioned instance of a predefined non-ordered location group as specified in a PredefinedLocationsPublication.

trafficStatusDefault.title: trafficStatusDefault
trafficStatusDefault.description: The default value of traffic status that can be assumed to apply to the locations defined by the associated predefined location set.

RoadSurfaceConditionInformation.title: RoadSurfaceConditionInformation
RoadSurfaceConditionInformation.description: Measurements of road surface conditions which are related to the weather.

weatherRelatedRoadConditionType.title: weatherRelatedRoadConditionType
weatherRelatedRoadConditionType.description: The type of road surface condition that is related to the weather which is affecting the driving conditions.

SinglePhysicalQuantity.title: SinglePhysicalQuantity
SinglePhysicalQuantity.description: A measured or calculated physical quantity at a single instant or period in time, with related properties explaining its context, meaning or status

SiteMeasurements.title: SiteMeasurements
SiteMeasurements.description: A  measurement data set derived from a specific measurement site.

measurementSiteReference.title: measurementSiteReference
measurementSiteReference.description: A reference to a versioned measurement site record defined in a Measurement Site table.

physicalQuantity.title: physicalQuantity
physicalQuantity.description: Indexed measured value associated with the measurement site. The index uniquely associates the measurement value with the corresponding indexed measurement characteristics defined for the measurement site.

measurementTimeDefault.title: measurementTimeDefault
measurementTimeDefault.description: The time associated with the set of measurements.

SpeedPercentile.title: SpeedPercentile
SpeedPercentile.description: Details of percentage (from an observation set) of vehicles whose speeds fall below a stated value.

vehiclePercentage.title: vehiclePercentage
vehiclePercentage.description: The percentage of vehicles from the observation set whose speeds fall below the stated speed (speedPercentile).

speedPercentile.title: speedPercentile
speedPercentile.description: The speed below which the associated percentage of vehicles in the measurement set are travelling at.

TimeMeaningEnum.title: TimeMeaningEnum
TimeMeaningEnum.description: Explains the meaning of a specific time value with respect to a time period

TimeProfiledPhysicalQuantity.title: TimeProfiledPhysicalQuantity
TimeProfiledPhysicalQuantity.description: A set of values for a measured or calculated physical quantity over a set of measurement or calculation times

TrafficConcentration.title: TrafficConcentration
TrafficConcentration.description: Averaged measurements or calculations of traffic concentration.

density.title: density
density.description: An averaged measurement or calculation of the concentration of vehicles at the specified measurement site.

occupancy.title: occupancy
occupancy.description: An averaged measurement or calculation of the percentage of time that a section of road at the specified measurement site is occupied by vehicles.

TrafficData.title: TrafficData
TrafficData.description: Measured or derived values relating to traffic or individual vehicle movements on a specific section or at a specific point on the road network.

forVehiclesWithCharacteristicsOf.title: forVehiclesWithCharacteristicsOf
forVehiclesWithCharacteristicsOf.description: Used to define the vehicle characteristics to which the TrafficValue is applicable primarily in Elaborated Data Publications, but may also be used in Measured Data Publications to override vehicle characteristics defined for the measurement site.

TrafficDensityValue.title: TrafficDensityValue
TrafficDensityValue.description: A measured or calculated value of the density of vehicles on a unit stretch of road in a given direction.

densityOfVehicles.title: densityOfVehicles
densityOfVehicles.description: A value of traffic density expressed in the number of vehicles per kilometre of road.

TrafficFlow.title: TrafficFlow
TrafficFlow.description: Averaged measurements or calculations of traffic flow rates.

axleFlow.title: axleFlow
axleFlow.description: An averaged measurement or calculation of flow rate defined in terms of the number of vehicle axles passing the specified measurement site.

pcuFlow.title: pcuFlow
pcuFlow.description: An averaged measurement or calculation of flow rate defined in terms of the number of passenger car units passing the specified measurement site.

percentageLongVehicles.title: percentageLongVehicles
percentageLongVehicles.description: An averaged measurement or calculation of the percentage of long vehicles contained in the traffic flow at the specified measurement site.

vehicleFlow.title: vehicleFlow
vehicleFlow.description: An averaged measurement of flow rate defined in terms of the number of vehicles passing the specified measurement site.

normallyExpectedFlow.title: normallyExpectedFlow
normallyExpectedFlow.description: The vehicle flow which is expected for the given period (e.g. date/time, holiday status etc.) and any known quasi-static conditions (e.g. long-term roadworks). This value is derived from historical analysis.

annualAverageDailyTraffic.title: annualAverageDailyTraffic
annualAverageDailyTraffic.description: Daily traffic flow averaged from the total over one year.

monthlyAverageDailyTraffic.title: monthlyAverageDailyTraffic
monthlyAverageDailyTraffic.description: Daily traffic flow averaged from the total over one month.

axleCharacteristics.title: axleCharacteristics
axleCharacteristics.description: Axle characteristics for which the flow measurement applies.

TrafficGap.title: TrafficGap
TrafficGap.description: Averaged measurements or calculations of traffic gap i.e. the distance or time interval between vehicles, measured between the rear of one vehicle and the front of the following vehicle.

averageDistanceGap.title: averageDistanceGap
averageDistanceGap.description: The average distance between the front of one vehicle and the rear of the preceding vehicle, averaged for all vehicles within a defined measurement period at the specified measurement site.

averageTimeGap.title: averageTimeGap
averageTimeGap.description: The average time gap between the front of one vehicle and the rear of the preceding vehicle, averaged for all vehicles within a defined measurement period at the specified measurement site.

TrafficHeadway.title: TrafficHeadway
TrafficHeadway.description: Averaged measurements or calculations of traffic headway, i.e. the distance or time interval between vehicles. This is measured one end (normally the front) of one vehicle to the same end of the following vehicle.

averageDistanceHeadway.title: averageDistanceHeadway
averageDistanceHeadway.description: The average distance between one end (normally the front) of this vehicle and the same end of the preceding vehicle, averaged for all vehicles within a defined measurement period at the specified measurement site.

averageTimeHeadway.title: averageTimeHeadway
averageTimeHeadway.description: The average time interval between one end (normally the front) of this vehicle and the same end of the preceding vehicle, averaged for all vehicles within a defined measurement period at the specified measurement site.

TrafficSpeed.title: TrafficSpeed
TrafficSpeed.description: Averaged measurements or calculations of traffic speed.

averageVehicleSpeed.title: averageVehicleSpeed
averageVehicleSpeed.description: An averaged measurement or calculation of the speed of vehicles at the specified location.

normallyExpectedSpeed.title: normallyExpectedSpeed
normallyExpectedSpeed.description: The average vehicle speed which is expected for the given period (e.g. date/time, holiday status etc.) and any known quasi-static conditions (e.g. long-term roadworks). This value is derived from historical analysis.

TrafficStatus.title: TrafficStatus
TrafficStatus.description: The status of traffic conditions on a specific section or at a specific point on the road network.

trafficTrendType.title: trafficTrendType
trafficTrendType.description: A characterization of the trend in the traffic conditions at the specified location and direction.

trafficStatus.title: trafficStatus
trafficStatus.description: Status of traffic conditions on the identified section of road in the specified direction.

TrafficStatusEnum.title: TrafficStatusEnum
TrafficStatusEnum.description: List of terms used to describe traffic conditions.

TrafficStatusValue.title: TrafficStatusValue
TrafficStatusValue.description: A measured or calculated value of the status of traffic conditions on a section of road in a specified direction.

trafficStatusValue.title: trafficStatusValue
trafficStatusValue.description: A status value of traffic conditions on the identified section of road in the specified direction.

TravelTimeData.title: TravelTimeData
TravelTimeData.description: Derived/computed travel time information relating to a linear section of the road network; forecast = true means a forecast for a vehicle at the start of the specified location, forecast = false means calculation/measurement at the end.

travelTimeTrendType.title: travelTimeTrendType
travelTimeTrendType.description: The current trend in the travel time between the defined locations in the specified direction.

travelTimeType.title: travelTimeType
travelTimeType.description: Indication of the way in which the travel time is derived.

travelTime.title: travelTime
travelTime.description: Derived/computed travel time information relating to a specific group of locations.

freeFlowTravelTime.title: freeFlowTravelTime
freeFlowTravelTime.description: The travel time which would be expected under ideal free flow conditions.

normallyExpectedTravelTime.title: normallyExpectedTravelTime
normallyExpectedTravelTime.description: The travel time which is expected for the given period (e.g. date/time, holiday status etc.) and any known quasi-static conditions (e.g. long-term roadworks). This value is derived from historical analysis.

travelTimeDelay.title: travelTimeDelay
travelTimeDelay.description: Delay in travel time compared to free-flow conditions

freeFlowSpeed.title: freeFlowSpeed
freeFlowSpeed.description: The free flow speed expected under ideal conditions, corresponding to the freeFlowTravelTime.

TravelTimeTrendTypeEnum.title: TravelTimeTrendTypeEnum
TravelTimeTrendTypeEnum.description: List of terms used to describe the trend in travel times.

TravelTimeTypeEnum.title: TravelTimeTypeEnum
TravelTimeTypeEnum.description: List of ways in which travel times are derived.

VehiclesPerDay.title: VehiclesPerDay
VehiclesPerDay.description: A rate of vehicle flow in units of vehicles per day

WeatherData.title: WeatherData
WeatherData.description: Measured or derived values relating to the weather at a specific location or locations.
